name: Byrin's Maze
description:
In this game you will be playing as our little fox Byrin (pronounced as in labyrinth). He is stuck in a game that is falling apart and has fallen into a maze being corrupted as we speak. The longer he stays the more he loses his sanity. Go as fast as you can to escape, and save him.

Controls:

  • A: Left
  • D: Right
  • W: Jump

Byrin goes insane after being in the maze for 3 minutes. Collect pills to stave off the insanity for 5 seconds.
